### 说明
 基于[Axios](https://github.com/axios/axios) 封装 
 - 过滤器拦截
 - 过期状态码校验
 - Promises
 
### Fetcher
 - 统一错误拦截
 

### http api
- http.get(config)
- http.post(config)

### http examples
```javascript
functionName: function ({state, commit, rootState}, data) {
    http.get({
      url: '/api/auth-service/auth/loginOut.do',
      data: data,
      success: function (response) {
        if (response.code === '000000') {
           commit('successxxx', response);
        }
      },
      error: function () {
        commit('errorxxx', response);
      }
    });
  }
  

functionName: function ({state, commit, rootState}, data) {
    http.post({
      url: '/api/auth-service/user/updatePassword.do',
      data: data,
      headers: {
        'Content-Type': 'application/x-www-form-urlencoded'
      },
      success: function (response) {
         if (response.code === '000000') {
          commit('editPasswordStatus', response);
        }else{
          commit('errorxxx', response);
        }
      },
      error: function () {
        commit('errorxxx', response);
      }
    });
  }
```
### Promises
```javascript
action.js
functionName: function ({state, commit, rootState}, data) {
   return http.get({
      url: '/api/auth-service/auth/loginOut.do',
      data: data,
      success: function (response) {
        if (response.code === '000000') {
           commit('successxxx', response);
        }
      },
      error: function () {
        commit('errorxxx', response);
      }
    });
  }
  
do.js
  this.funcitonName(params).then(()=>{
    .......
  })
  
  
```
